alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 1:58PM MST until November 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Traffic speeds will be reduced. Allow extra time to reach your destination. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
